Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Zitman 2010, 219, suggests tomb 19 as provenance for this object. But this information cannot be deduced with certainty from Hogarth's notes and no tomb number is marked on the objects.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 219)
Cartwright and Taylor 2008 / Wooden Egyptian archery bows in the collections of the British Museum (p.78)
